pinyin: Ta3 ke4 la1 ma3 gan1 Sha1 mo4

definition: variant of 克[ke4]/to subdue/to overthrow/to restrain
Ke (c. 2000 BC), seventh of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
tree trunk/main part of sth/to manage/to work/to do/capable/cadre/to kill (slang)/to fuck (vulgar)

sentences.english: To the west of Dunhuang lies the Taklamakan Desert.
sentences.chinese: 位于敦煌西部的是塔克拉玛干沙漠。

sentences.english: The southern route followed the fringes of the Takla Makan to eventually end up at the same destination.
sentences.chinese: 南边沿着塔克拉玛干沙漠边缘，最终到达相同的终点。

sentences.english: The environmental circumstances of artificial greenbelt are extremely adverse in the hinterland of Taklimakan Desert.
sentences.chinese: 塔克拉玛干沙漠腹地环境条件极其恶劣。

pinyin: Gu3 er3 ban1 tong1 gu3 te4 Sha1 mo4
Ku4 mu3 ta3 ge2 Sha1 mo4

definition: Tarim Basin depression in southern Xinjiang
Pamir high plateau on the border between Xinjiang and Tajikistan
Lop Nor, salt lake and nuclear testing site in Xinjiang
Karakorum mountain range in west Xinjiang
Tsaidam or Qaidam basin (Mongolian: salt marsh), depression northeast of the Plateau of Tibet, located between the Qilian Shan and the Kunlun Shan at the northern margin of the Tibetan Plateau.
